The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.

* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.

* Full Version *

This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:

- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.

* How to Use *

To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:

- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).
- Average length of the menstrual cycle (adjust it on the “Settings” screen).
- Length of the luteal phase (most women can use the default value).

The application works best for women with regular menstrual cycle. But average cycle length is also a good way to predict when the ovulation should happen.

Join the millions of medical professionals who use MDCalc daily to support clinical decision making at the bedside. Since 2005, MDCalc has been the leading medical reference for the most relevant, up-to-date and widely-used clinical calculators that support evidence-based patient care. MDCalc clinical decision support is created exclusively by board-certified physicians for use by physicians, physician assistants, nurse practitioners, pharmacists, and medical students. The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.

* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.

* Full Version *

This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:

- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.

* How to Use *

To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:

- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).
- Average length of the menstrual cycle (adjust it on the “Settings” screen).
- Length of the luteal phase (most women can use the default value).

The application works best for women with regular menstrual cycle. But average cycle length is also a good way to predict when the ovulation should happen.

summary.label:
The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.

* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.

* Full Version *

This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:

- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.

* How to Use *

To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:

- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).
- Average length of the menstrual cycle (adjust it on the “Settings” screen).
- Length of the luteal phase (most women can use the default value).

The application works best for women with regular menstrual cycle. But average cycle length is also a good way to predict when the ovulation should happen.

Электронная версия Карманного справочника содержит современные клинические рекомендации, основанные на фактических данных, для стационарного ведения детей.

Рекомендации разработаны для врачей, медсестер и других медицинских сотрудников, отвечающих за лечение детей. Особое внимание уделено ведению заболеваний, составляющих основные причины детской смертности:

• Болезни новорожденных, низкая масса тела при рождении, недоношенные дети, сепсис, перинатальная асфиксия и врожденные аномалии;
• Пневмония и другие проблемы с дыханием, такие как бронхиолит, астма и туберкулез
• Диарея, острая и затяжная
• Лихорадка, включая малярию, менингит, септическую лихорадку и ревматическую лихорадку
• Тяжелое нарушение питания 
• ВИЧ/СПИД
• Хирургические проблемы, включая травмы и ожоги.

Электронное приложение содержит рекомендации по этапам ведения больных детей в стационаре: экстренной сортировочной оценке, методике обследования детей, лабораторным исследованиям, поддерживающему уходу и мониторингу, выписке и последующим наблюдением.

Данное электронное приложение позволит пользоваться рекомендациями в режиме офлайн. Кроме того, оно располагает следующими удобными для пользователя функциями: интерактивные ссылки, поиск, возможность просмотра иллюстраций в полном размере, а также использование формул для расчёта дозировок лекарственных препаратов (вместо таблиц, используемых в печатной версии руководства).

Это электронное приложение было разработано  Европейским региональным бюро Всемирной организации здравоохранения в сотрудничестве с IT специалистом Michel Englert.


The WHO e-Pocketbook provides clinical guidelines for children requiring hospital care.

Designed for doctors, nurses and other health workers responsible for the care of children, these guidelines focus on the management of major causes of childhood mortality, including:

•Neonatal illness, including low birth weight, prematurity, sepsis, perinatal asphyxia, and congenital anomalies 
•Pneumonia and other breathing problems, including bronchiolitis, asthma and tuberculosis
•Diarrhea, acute and chronic
•Fever, including malaria, meningitis, septicemia and rheumatic fever
•Severe acute malnutrition
•HIV/AIDS
•Surgical problems, including trauma and burns

The app includes guidance on the stages of management for every child: Triage and Emergency treatment, History and Examination, Laboratory investigations, Supportive care and Monitoring, Discharge planning and Follow-up.

With this app, all guidelines can be viewed offline. The app contains some user friendly features like interactive links, search function, possibility for viewing illustrations in full size by tapping, and formulas for medication dosage (instead of tables used in the printed version of the guidelines).

This app has been developed by the World Health Organization Regional Office for Europe in collaboration with IT expert Mr. Michel Englert.

Privacy policy - http://www.euro.who.int/en/home/privacy-statement

In AMBOSS ist das medizinische Wissen aktuell, leitliniengerecht, fachgebietsübergreifend und prägnant in einer App vereint. AMBOSS bildet so ein interdisziplinäres Wissens- und Nachschlagewerk für Ärztinnen und Ärzte. AMBOSS liefert schnell Antworten auf medizinische Fragen, umfangreiche Informationen zu Krankheitsbildern, sowie Diagnostik- und Therapiemöglichkeiten inklusive leitliniengerechter Medikationsempfehlungen. 
Hinter AMBOSS steht eine über 70-köpfige ärztliche Redaktion, die täglich auf Basis evidenzbasierter Quellen die medizinischen Inhalte erweitert und aktualisiert. 
AMBOSS begleitet durch Stations- und Praxisalltag, Famulatur, PJ, M3, Hammerexamen, Physikum und die Facharztprüfung. 
Dank der verschiedenen Modi (Arzt, Klinik und Vorklinik) passt sich AMBOSS perfekt den individuellen Bedürfnissen eines Mediziners an. 


AMBOSS für Ärztinnen und Ärzte:

• Nachschlagewerk und medizinisches Lexikon in einer App: Diagnostik, Therapie, Medikation und Differentialdiagnosen 
• Online und Offline für Stations- und Praxisalltag – auch ohne Internetverbindung auf alles Wissen zugreifen

• Konkrete Diagnostik- und Therapieempfehlungen – mit Wirkstoffübersichten und präzisen Dosierungsempfehlungen unterstützen die Erstellung von Behandlungsplänen
• Allgemeine Notfallkompetenzen: Übersichtliche Notfallmedizin-Abschnitte
• Kooperation mit verschiedenen Fachgesellschaften und Integration der Leitlinien (DGIM, DGOU, DGVS...)

Collect your REDCap data in an offline environment in the REDCap mobile app, and then sync your data back to your project on a REDCap server.

REDCap is a web application, which requires the Internet to be used, but the REDCap mobile app allows for offline data collection for your REDCap projects. You can create your project in REDCap, securely download your project to the REDCap mobile app on your iPad or iPhone, collect data on the device (with or without an Internet connection), and then securely send your data back to your project on a REDCap server.

Features
•	Multi-user interface with secure login that allows each user account to collect data for multiple REDCap projects in the app.
•	In addition to text and structured data, you can store and transmit photos, videos, signatures, and audio to REDCap. 
•	When collecting data in the app from a participant, for security purposes you can easily restrict access to the rest of the app as they enter their data.
•	All user activity in the app is logged for audit purposes. The full logging history can be sent to your project on the REDCap server.

Who is the REDCap Mobile App for? In order to use the REDCap Mobile App, REDCap must be installed on your institution’s server and must be at version 6.5.0 or higher. The REDCap Mobile App is designed to fit the following scenarios:
•	A REDCap project that needs data to be collected without any Internet access available.
•	A REDCap project that needs data to be collected with sporadic Internet access.
If mobile devices are desired for use in REDCap data collection, and if WiFi or cellular Internet is amply available, then it is suggested to use the REDCap mobile web view that is available on the REDCap server, which provides real-time access to data.

What is REDCap? REDCap is a mature, secure web application for building and managing online surveys and databases, and it is used by hundreds of thousands of users around the world (http://projectredcap.org). Before setting up a REDCap project in the app, you must already have a user account on a REDCap server hosted by a participating REDCap partner institution. If you belong to an institution that does not have REDCap, please visit http://projectredcap.org/participate.php to learn how to get REDCap where you are.

What are some limitations of this app? The REDCap mobile app runs in conjunction with the REDCap web application software. You must already have a REDCap user account and project on a REDCap server before being able to download the project to the app. The app cannot function or stand independently without a REDCap server.

title.label: REDCap Mobile App - Vanderbilt University Medical Center

When children suffer traumatic injury to the head, both clinician and parents have an inclination to test for clinically important traumatic brain injury (ciTBI). A provider has the option to recommend a computed tomography (CT) scan, which exposes the patient to ionizing radiation and is costly, or recommend observation, which carries the risk of not treating an emergency issue.

The current Pediatric Emergency Care Applied Research Network (PECARN) rules use simple and easy to memorize rules to assess the likelihood of ciTBI.

ciTBI Calc provides updated versions of the PECARN rules based on a modern machine learning approach.

Консультация врачей

Во время онлайн-консультации вы можете задать вопросы по поводу своего самочувствия, рассказать о беспокоящих симптомах, получить рекомендации по профилактике хронических или сезонных заболеваний. Врач даст максимально полную консультацию по полученной от вас информации.

Электронная консультация поможет вам получить первую медицинскую помощь до приезда скорой, уточнить показания и назначения после приема, чтобы следующий очный приём был эффективнее, воспользоваться консультацией узкого специалиста, которого трудно найти в шаговой доступности, получить результаты анализов и их расшифровку, повторно обратиться после очного приёма. Электронная история болезни под рукой

В обычной поликлинике история болезни хранится в регистратуре, и у вас нет возможности просматривать историю лечения в удобное время. В нашем приложении вся медицинская информация записывается в вашу электронную медицинскую карту автоматически, ни один факт не потеряется.

Mental health conditions, such as depression or anxiety are real, common and treatable. And recovery is possible.

A GAME MADE JUST FOR DERMATOLOGISTS
Top Derm is made by derms for derms. We worked with over 140 derm experts to create a medically accurate, fun, and challenging experience, unlike any other medical resource you’ve ever seen. Top Derm is a first-of-its-kind mobile game made by dermatology experts for dermatologists. Covering a wide variety of dermatology topics, Top Derm is packed with incredible, medically accurate, computer-generated derm imagery, in quick-burst challenges pulled from evidence-based research. Built on neuroscience-based game mechanics, Top Derm is a unique medical resource that also happens to be a ton of fun.

DERM IMAGERY LIKE YOU HAVE NEVER SEEN BEFORE
Our dermatologist-approved, groundbreaking DeepSkinFX™ Generator harnesses the most cutting-edge visual effects and video game technology to create mind-blowing, medically accurate, high-resolution imagery of any skin disorder on any region of the body and any skin tone, so you can visually experience a wide variety of derm scenarios.

FROM ADULT DERMATOLOGY TO ZEBRA CASES AND BEYOND
Short, rapid-fire, focused challenge packs deliver well-rounded dermatology challenges that strengthen your derm knowledge and your ability to visually identify common and rare skin disorders.

NEUROSCIENCE MEETS ENTERTAINMENT ON THE GO
Top Derm is backed by neuroscience-based game mechanics that help you acquire and retain knowledge. It’s also a ton of fun and ready to go on your phone at any time. So whether you’re between patients, on a lunch break, or just sitting down to relax, Top Derm is waiting for you.

FEATURES

EARN CME CREDITS
Finding the time and opportunity to earn CME credits can be challenging. We make it easy, convenient, and fun.

A WIDE VARIETY OF SUBJECTS
Challenges cover a breadth of topics: skin cancer, pediatric dermatology, adult dermatology, cosmetic dermatology, and surgical dermatology. New challenge packs are released regularly.

CHOOSE YOUR TOPICS
Gameplay is customized to your interests. Choose your favorite topics, and you’ll be presented with more challenges covering those areas.

SKIN OF COLOR
Skin tone affects the appearance of different disorders. Our DeepSkinFX™ Generator creates medically accurate imagery showcasing conditions on different skin types so you can view conditions as they appear on various skin tones.

TAKE A CLOSER LOOK
All clinical imagery in Top Derm is included at high resolution for close-up study. Tap the magnifying glass at the corner of the image, and it expands to full screen. Pinch and spread to zoom in or out. It’s all in the details.

PERSONAL EXPERTISE MAPS
Track your performance with a dynamic report that shows your progress, areas of strength, and improvement opportunities.

SUPPLEMENTAL READING
Every challenge is built on evidence-based research. We’ve included the option to review that material at the end of each challenge.

SHAPE THE GAME, HELP THE COMMUNITY
Rate and give feedback on the challenges to help make the game as good as it can be and contribute to the state of the art in dermatology.

BUILT BY LEADING DERMATOLOGY EXPERTS
Our team of world-renowned dermatology experts includes Peter Lio, MD Dermatology, Medical Dermatology Associates of Chicago; Shraddha Desai, MD, FAAD, Director of Cosmetic and Laser Surgery, Dupage Medical Group Dermatology, Adjunct Professor of Dermatology, Loyola University; Aaron Fuchs, MD, Fuchs Dermatology; Sara Hogan, MD, Dermatology, Laser Skin Care Center Dermatology Associates; Dr. Sara Dickie, Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery, Illinois Dermatology Institute; and others.

Il tuo pediatra sempre con te!
MioPediatra è un'app realizzata in collaborazione con i pediatri italiani.

Progettata appositamente per essere un filo diretto ed esclusivo con il medico dei tuoi figli, l’app è collegata alla cartella clinica utilizzata nell'attività ambulatoriale.
In questo modo puoi ricevere notifiche personalizzate dal pediatra, che sarà in grado di inviarti degli utili reminder per:

- Bilanci di salute
- Visite di controllo e percorsi personalizzati di terapia
- Raccomandazioni sanitarie generali
- Linee guida personalizzate sull’età dei tuoi figli

MioPediatra è un modo smart per aiutarti a rimanere sempre aggiornato sul percorso medico dei tuoi figli, uno strumento al passo coi tempi per curare al meglio la salute dei piccoli di casa.

Nella fase di registrazione è necessario utilizzare il numero di cellulare comunicato al pediatra.
Il servizio è disponibile solo se il tuo pediatra ha aderito all'iniziativa mioPediatra.

L’app è gratuita e in continua evoluzione: per rimanere sempre informato controlla gli aggiornamenti sullo store, oppure visita il sito www.miopediatra.it!
